questions.question: What is the typical welding position used in Shielded metal arc welding?
What is the typical shielding gas used in Shielded metal arc welding?
What is the purpose of the slag in Shielded Metal Arc Welding?

answers.b: To provide filler material for the weld
answers.c: To protect the weld from atmospheric contamination

questions.question: How arc is generated in SMAW?

answers.a: By striking the electrode against the workpiece
answers.b: By using a non-consumable tungsten electrode
answers.d: Using a gas shield to ionize the air

questions.question: How does the electrode coating affect the welding process in SMAW?

answers.a: It determines the direction of the current flow
answers.b: It affects the melting rate and deposition rate of the electrode
answers.c: It determines the type of shielding gas used
answers.d: It has no effect on the welding process

questions.question: Which of the following is not a type of electrode coating used in SMAW?
